season_window.notes: Jay Johnson reloading after 2023 national title and 2024 Super Regional exit.

ballpark.name: Alex Box Stadium, Skip Bertman Field
ballpark.recent_upgrades: Installed new Hawkeye camera suite for pitch design (July 2024).

head_coach.name: Jay Johnson
head_coach.staff_tenure: Fourth season at LSU after Arizona tenure.
head_coach.playing_style: Elite on-base percentage with pro-style development; heavy on scouting and data blending.
head_coach.recent_quotes: Told The Advocate (Oct 2024) they want two portal-ready lefties to complement returning rotation.

nil_operations.recent_initiatives: Launched 'Box Club' premium experience for baseball donors with player meetups (Sept 2024).

historical_context.program_trend: Title-or-bust expectations; NIL remains national benchmark.

intel_notes.summary: Tiger Athletic Foundation exploring baseball-only dorm option near Nicholson Drive.
intel_notes.source_hint: WBRZ investigative report on athletics facilities

data_quality.next_actions: Populate roster retention data; verify analytics staff assignments.
